title: Constitution of India - Article 21
content:
Protection of Life and Personal Liberty.
        No person shall be deprived of his life or personal liberty except according to procedure 
        established by law. This article has been interpreted broadly to include right to privacy, 
        right to health, right to education.

title: Constitution of India - Article 14
content:
Equality Before Law.
        The State shall not deny to any person equality before the law or the equal protection of the 
        laws within the territory of India.
